lasermaze

Interface Mirror

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MyMirror

    public interface Mirror
    This Mirror interface provide functions which define the characteristics of a mirror. For example, how the mirror change the travel direction of a laser light.
    Author:
    Jingran

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String status 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String changeDirections(java.lang.String direction)
      This function define how the mirror can change the direction of the laser Need to be implemented in your own code

    • Field Detail

      • status

        static final java.lang.String status
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • changeDirections

        java.lang.String changeDirections(java.lang.String direction)
        This function define how the mirror can change the direction of the laser Need to be implemented in your own code
        Parameters:
        direction - the direction of the light when hit the mirror.
        Returns:
        the direction after pass the mirror
